data.message:
Hello Students,

The government is rewarding refunds up to $2500.00, which do not have to be paid back, for students who have taken out student loans in 2009-2010 and/or to students who have made book or computer purchases in 2009. To see if you qualify, register your contact information and estimated school expenses through one of the following links and a tax credit specialist will guide you further.

v  https://tpas.infusionsoft.com/go/Education/dbland/

v  https://tpas.infusionsoft.com/go/main/dbland/

Dante’ Bland, 123 Tax Credit Affiliate

Education Credits Program

123bland@gmail.com

(877)-987-7237
